source.name: United In Focus - Manchester United FC News

articles.author: Olly Dawes
articles.title: Italian media claim European giants have considered Jadon Sancho swap - United In Focus - Manchester United FC News
articles.description: Juventus ace Federico Chiesa has been linked with a move to Manchester United in an exchange for Jadon Sancho.
articles.content:
Manchester United have welcomed Jadon Sancho back into first-team training but that hasnt stopped rumours surrounding his future at Old Trafford.
Few fans could have expected a way back for Jadon Sa… [+2677 chars]
